name: COLORSHOT
description:
This is a Mobile based HyperCasual game.

Inspired by the old game called "ZUIMA DELUXE" 

You have to shoot the rotating balls with a gun controlled by touch swipe left/right and Tap Controls.

Only Bullets with same colour as the ball can be destroy the ball.so keep a close watch on the bullet colour before shooting. as there are negative points for wasting a bullet.

There are quite a a lot of In-Game settings availabe that you can choose to your comfort levels.
